Welcome to a world of opportunity!

MediaTek is always looking for talented people to work in our corporate offices around the world. We’re headquartered in Taiwan, but we also have sales and research subsidiaries in Mainland China, US, UK, Finland, Sweden, India, Japan, South Korea and Singapore.

We offer competitive salaries, a range of benefits and personalized programs for professional development.
For more information, please visit our website ＞＞ https://www.mediatek.com/who-we-are


주요업무
1.WiFi/BT/GPS/FM connectivity IC bring up, verification and system application
2.Connectivity system performance optimization and verification
3.Reference circuit design and verification
4.Technical support for customer mass production

자격요건
1.MS degree in Electrical, Electronics, Communication engineering or equivalent
2.Knowledge about RF/microwave circuit and transceiver
3.Familiar with smartphone WiFi & BT system design and verification
4.Familiar with RF system test equipment such as: VNA, spectrum analyzer, signal generator, oscilloscope

우대사항
• PCB CAD tools (PADS/OrCAD) experience is preferred

혜택 및 복지
• 가족 경조사 지원 (배우자 포함)
• 패밀리데이 운영
• 결혼, 출산 선물 제공
• 종합병원 건강검진 제공 (연 1회)
• 교육비,통신비,동호회비, 여름휴가비 지원
• 명절, 생일 상품권 지급
